rules_text:
When Shadowy Sighting enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Create a Sighting token and attach Shadowy Sighting to it. [i](It’s a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.”)[/i]
Enchanted creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
